plot: With her husband on his deathbed, a wife discovers a chilling secret. A sensually heightened world of sound is used to accentuate the point of view of the wife.
title: A Thousand Words
plot_es: With her husband on his deathbed, a wife discovers a chilling secret. A sensually heightened world of sound is used to accentuate the point of view of the wife.
plot_en: With her husband on his deathbed, a wife discovers a chilling secret. A sensually heightened world of sound is used to accentuate the point of view of the wife.

produce.name: Florida State University School of Motion Picture, Television and Recording Arts
